Who's this guy?

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Few words about me

I am a third year Computer Science student at The Jan Kochanowski University in Kielce. I am intrested in programming and web development for about two years. I spend a lot of time coding and improving my programming skills every day. I am currently working on the project which is based on IGDB video game community website. For the project I am using technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JS(ES6), Sass, Spring Framework with Hibernate and MySQL database. I encourage you to take a look at the photo gallery from the process of creating the website.

Love learning

Learning new technologies and frameworks is one of my favorite aspect of being a programmer.

Puzzle-solver

I always trying to think with a clear head and figure out the problem that I am currently facing with.

Team player

It is important for me to be able to get along with co-workers and to deal with people with varying abilities and respond to differences of opinion.
